data.text: Brookfield Renewable Energy Marketing US LLC (BREMUS) is a licensed Energy Services Company (ESCO) in the state of New York. We provide renewable energy solutions to higher education institutions, large commercial and industrial businesses, and municipalities and draw from our large, diversified portfolio of hydropower facilities located across the state. BREMUS has the flexibility to negotiate specific terms and rates for customersâ€™ electricity supply while those customers continue to receive transmission and distribution services from the utility.
